name: Qcash
description: "Qcash is a cryptocurrency with a value meant to mirror the value of the CNY(Chinese Yuan). The price of 1 Qcash is 1 CNY. Users can use 1 CNY to buy 1 QC and then use QC to exchange BTC, LTC, ETH or other crypto assets. QC is a stale coin and an intermediate currency for traders who want to use CNY to exchange with cryptocurrencies."
